infos.value: A time when Rundall's forces consisted only of its first division, «Sonitus», and its second division, «Crucium».
Lu'Cia, who would go on to become commander of Rundall's third division, «Calorum», belonged to «Crucium».
It appears that followers of the Church of the Crystal have invaded Rundall territory and are mining Crystals.
Now that we have been liberated from Lykeros's subordination, we cannot permit Sadali to do as he pleases.
Thunder out the name of Rundall. Make known the name of Jayden.
Understandable, given it's your first campaign. But you needn't worry.
Some measly Church of the Crystal followers are no match for «Crucium».
Our destination is the Crystal mine in the Galada District to the southeast.
